title: Cant log in?
body:
Sorry for bothering you, but I cant log in at all, I checked the server status page and it was alright and I tried all of the tips you had in your login issues page, would you like me to redo any of those steps just in case I did something wrong? or is this an issue for multiple people? thank you so much in advance for your help <3

also it  specifically says "unable to connect to the login queue..."

Edit: I too was able to log back in, idk what the issue was lol maybe too many people trying to login all at once XD who knows, anyways~ ily Riot-kun <3

replies.body:
Same issue.

Edit: Looks like I was able to log in. Huh. Hope this doesnt become a recurrent thing

Can confirm. I'm having the same issue. 

"Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here" 

Server status says nothing is wrong.

EDIT: ...well...I'm back in. Not sure what the issue was though.

Heeeeey I'm glad you all were able to finally get logged in! It looks like we might have had a small hiccup with those login servers over the night, and as far as we can tell now everything is running smoothly. If you still can't get logged in, try giving that client a refresh!
